channel.title: Tiny oversight in Lambda Core? [Fixed]
channel.description: While playing, I noticed that the chapter title never actually pops up during Lambda Core! (Or maybe it does and I'm somewhat blind.) This isn't a big deal by any means, but I just thought it might be worth pointing out. :slight_smile:

item.title: Tiny oversight in Lambda Core? [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Disturbulator
item.description:
It Indeed Does.

When you Open the Doors to the slanted Freight Elevator (the One with the Army Truck to the Right side of it).

Read full topic

item.title: Tiny oversight in Lambda Core? [Fixed]
